element.name: Monster Manual
element.description:
A menagerie of deadly monsters for the world's greatest roleplaying game.

The Monster Manual presents a horde of classic Dungons & Dragons creatures, including dragons, giants, mind flayers, and beholders-a monstrous feast for Dungeon Masters ready to challenge their players and populate their adventures.

The monsters contained herin are culled from the D&D game's illustrious history, with easy-to-use game statistics and thrilling stories to feed your imagination.>/p>
